page.title: 14Clubs and groups.
page.content: There are lots of clubs in the area that people can join. For children there are cubs, brownies, scouts and guides. There are also the youth club, swimming club and gymnastics. For very young children there is a playgroup which meets in Aberlour P. School. Also meeting in the grounds of the Primary school is one of the most recent and most popular clubs, the snooker club. It has a full size snooker table. Aberlour has its own football club with its own ground and pavilion down by the river. There are bowling, tennis and curling clubs. There are also community associations.
